trans-unit.source: Provides a fast, read-only, in-memory representation of an XML document by using the XPath data model.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma representação rápida, somente leitura e de memória de um documento XML usando o modelo de dados XPath.

trans-unit.source: For more information about processing XML data by using the XPath data model, see the [Process XML Data Using the XPath Data Model](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o processamento de dados XML usando o modelo de dados XPath, consulte o [processar dados XML usando o modelo de dados XPath](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) tópico.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"></xref> class from the XML data in the specified <xref:System.IO.Stream> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"> </xref> classe a partir de dados XML especificado na <xref:System.IO.Stream>objeto.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> object that contains the XML data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.Stream>objeto que contém os dados XML.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: An error was encountered in the XML data.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu um erro nos dados XML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"></xref> remains empty.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"> </xref> permanecerá vazia.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Stream> object passed as a parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.Stream>objeto passado como um parâmetro é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"></xref> class from the XML data that is contained in the specified <xref:System.IO.TextReader> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"> </xref> classe dos dados XML que está especificado na <xref:System.IO.TextReader>objeto.</xref:System.IO.TextReader>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.IO.TextReader> object has been used to load XML data, the cursor of the <xref:System.IO.TextReader> object is positioned at the end of the data.
trans-unit.target: Após o <xref:System.IO.TextReader>objeto foi usado para carregar dados XML, o cursor do <xref:System.IO.TextReader>o objeto será posicionado no final dos dados.</xref:System.IO.TextReader> </xref:System.IO.TextReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextReader> object must be reset to read through the data again.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.TextReader>objeto deve ser redefinido para ler os dados novamente.</xref:System.IO.TextReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextReader> object that contains the XML data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.TextReader>objeto que contém os dados XML.</xref:System.IO.TextReader>

trans-unit.source: An error was encountered in the XML data.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu um erro nos dados XML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"></xref> remains empty.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"> </xref> permanecerá vazia.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.TextReader> object passed as a parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IO.TextReader>objeto passado como um parâmetro é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.IO.TextReader>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"></xref> class from the XML data in the specified file.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"> </xref> classe dos dados XML no arquivo especificado.

trans-unit.source: To preserve white space, use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument.%23ctor%2A> constructor that accepts an <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: Para preservar espaço em branco, use o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument.%23ctor%2A>construtor que aceite uma <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>objeto como um parâmetro.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The path of the file that contains the XML data.
trans-unit.target: O caminho do arquivo que contém os dados XML.

trans-unit.source: An error was encountered in the XML data.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu um erro nos dados XML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"></xref> remains empty.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"> </xref> permanecerá vazia.

trans-unit.source: The file path parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro de caminho do arquivo é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"></xref> class from the XML data that is contained in the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"> </xref> classe dos dados XML que está especificado na <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objeto.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object can be used to load a whole XML document or part of an XML document into an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objeto pode ser usado para carregar um documento XML inteiro ou parte de um documento XML em um <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: To load part of an XML document into an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>, position the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object on the top XML node to load data from.
trans-unit.target: Ao carregar a parte de um documento XML em um <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>, posição de <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>o nó superior do XML para carregar dados de objeto.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>

trans-unit.source: When you create an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> by using the XPathDocument constructor, data is loaded from the current top node through all its siblings.
trans-unit.target: Quando você cria um <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>usando o construtor de XPathDocument, os dados são carregados a partir do nó superior atual por meio de todos os seus irmãos.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>

trans-unit.source: Afterwards, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> is positioned on the outer scope of the top XML node.
trans-unit.target: Posteriormente, o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>é posicionado no escopo exterior do nó superior do XML.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadSubtree%2A> method to load the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> into a particular element in the XML document.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, você pode usar o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadSubtree%2A>método ao carregar o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>em um determinado elemento no documento XML.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader.ReadSubtree%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when you use the XPathDocument constructor.
trans-unit.target: A seguir estão as observações importantes a considerar ao usar o construtor XPathDocument.

trans-unit.source: - An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object with the appropriate associated <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> object settings can be used to resolve entities or other references in XML data.
trans-unit.target: -Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objeto com adequado associado <xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver>configurações de objeto podem ser usadas para resolver entidades ou outras referências nos dados XML.</xref:System.Xml.XmlResolver> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object is positioned on a leaf node that is not valid for the root level of a document—for example, a white space or attribute node—the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object continues to read until it is positioned on a node that can be used for the root.
trans-unit.target: -Se a <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objeto está posicionado em um nó de folha que não é válido para o nível raiz de um documento — por exemplo, um espaço em branco ou um nó de atributo — o <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objeto continua a ler até que ele seja posicionado em um nó que pode ser usado para a raiz.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> begins loading at this point.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>começa a carregar neste momento.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>

trans-unit.source: - To preserve white space, use the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument.%23ctor%2A> constructor that accepts an <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: -Para preservar espaço em branco, use o <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument.%23ctor%2A>construtor que aceite uma <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>objeto como um parâmetro.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object that contains the XML data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objeto que contém os dados XML.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: An error was encountered in the XML data.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu um erro nos dados XML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"></xref> remains empty.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"> </xref> permanecerá vazia.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object passed as a parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objeto passado como um parâmetro é <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"></xref> class from the XML data in the file specified with the white space handling specified.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"> </xref> classe dos dados XML no arquivo especificado com o tratamento de espaço em branco especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace> object passed as a parameter specifies whether to preserve white space.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>objeto passado como um parâmetro especifica se deseja preservar espaço em branco.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace> preserves only significant white space; <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace> preserves all white space.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>preserva espaço em branco apenas significativo; <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>preserva todos os espaços em branco.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace></xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace> object is set to <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>objeto é definido como <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace> </xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>

trans-unit.source: - The functionality of the XPathDocument constructor is identical to that of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument.%23ctor%2A> constructor, except for the white space handling options described.
trans-unit.target: -A funcionalidade do construtor XPathDocument é idêntica do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument.%23ctor%2A>construtor, exceto para o espaço em branco tratamento opções descritas.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The path of the file that contains the XML data.
trans-unit.target: O caminho do arquivo que contém os dados XML.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>objeto.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>

trans-unit.source: An error was encountered in the XML data.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu um erro nos dados XML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"></xref> remains empty.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"> </xref> permanecerá vazia.

trans-unit.source: The file path parameter or <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace> object parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro de caminho de arquivo ou <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>é o parâmetro de objeto <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"></xref> class from the XML data that is contained in the specified <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object with the specified white space handling.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"> </xref> classe dos dados XML que está especificado na <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objeto com o tratamento de espaço em branco especificado.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace> object passed as a parameter specifies whether to preserve white space.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>objeto passado como um parâmetro especifica se deseja preservar espaço em branco.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace> preserves only significant white space; <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace> preserves all white space.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>preserva espaço em branco apenas significativo; <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>preserva todos os espaços em branco.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace></xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>

trans-unit.source: By default, the <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace> object is set to <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, o <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>objeto é definido como <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace> </xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>

trans-unit.source: - The functionality of the XPathDocument constructor is identical to that of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument.%23ctor%2A> constructor, except for the white space handling options described.
trans-unit.target: -A funcionalidade do construtor XPathDocument é idêntica do <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument.%23ctor%2A>construtor, exceto para o espaço em branco tratamento opções descritas.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object that contains the XML data.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>objeto que contém os dados XML.</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace> object.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>objeto.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>

trans-unit.source: An error was encountered in the XML data.
trans-unit.target: Ocorreu um erro nos dados XML.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"></xref> remains empty.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"> </xref> permanecerá vazia.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object parameter or <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace> object parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>parâmetro do objeto ou <xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace>é o parâmetro de objeto <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Xml.XmlSpace> </xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a read-only <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object for navigating through nodes in this <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa um somente leitura <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> objeto para navegar por nós neste <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the root element of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>.
trans-unit.target: O que <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>é posicionado no elemento raiz de <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: If there is no root element, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the first element in the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>.
trans-unit.target: Se não houver nenhum elemento raiz, que <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>é posicionado no primeiro elemento em <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: A read-only <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Somente leitura <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref> objeto.
